content:
After yesterday's entry I've just noticed I FORGOT TO ASK HIS NAME!! 
I'm such a fool ヾ(≧へ≦)〃

When i tot all hope was lost he came to my table during lunch. He didn't say anything but left a carton of apple juice on my table. He's soooo mysterious. (lll￢ω￢)

Anyways, people caught Mr. Horaju and Mr. Ren again, this time sitting together. Sumii thinks that they might be together. OooOOoooOO~~~
